text: Hypomanganate is an ion. Its chemical formula is MnO43-. It is bright blue. It disproportionates into manganates and manganese(IV) oxide easily. This can be stopped by adding a lot of a base. They are both reducing agents and oxidizing agents. They are made by reducing manganates with sulfites and hydrogen peroxide. ==Related pages== *Permanganate *Potassium hypomanganate *Potassium manganate Category:Manganese compounds Category:Oxyanions
title: Hypomanganate
